domain.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{currentDomainName}}</1>?

domainForm.name: Domain
domainForm.nameTooltip: Both full domain (e.g.: hello.com) and wildcard domain (e.g.: *.hello.com) are supported. Manage the protocol and certificates for a given domain independently here. And route configurations can isolate with each other by different domains.
domainForm.nameRequired: Only following inputs are allowed: upper- and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
domainForm.namePlaceholder: Only following inputs are allowed: upper- and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
domainForm.protocolTooltip: Following protocols are supported: HTTP (port 80) and HTTPS (port 443) protocols. An SSL certificate must be specified when using HTTPS protocol.
domainForm.certificateTooltip: Only certificates provided by SSL Certificates Service of Alibaba Clound are supported now.
domainForm.mustHttpsTooltip: Only certificates provided by SSL Certificates Service of Alibaba Clound are supported now.
domainForm.mustHttpsCheckboxTooltip: Only HTTPS (port 443) service is available. Requests sent to HTTP (port 80) service will be redirected to the corresponding HTTPS (port 443) service

dashboard.loadFailed: Error occurs when loading dashboard data. Please refresh the page later.
dashboard.notFound: No dashboard is available now. Click the button below to create one.

serviceSource.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{currentServiceSourceName}}</1>?

serviceSourceForm.typeTooltip: Following service source types are not supported: Nacos 1.x, Nacos2.x and Zookeeper.
serviceSourceForm.name: Service Source Name
serviceSourceForm.nameRequired: Only following inputs are allowed: upper-and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
serviceSourceForm.namePlaceholder: Only following inputs are allowed: upper-and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
serviceSourceForm.domainTooltip: It can be either an IP address or a domain name.
serviceSourceForm.domainPlaceholder: Only following inputs are allowed: upper-and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
serviceSourceForm.zkServicesPathTooltip: The root path of service registration are required for Zookeeper service sources. /dubbo and /services are listened by default. The former is the default root path of dubbo services, and the latter is the default root path of Sprin gCloud services
serviceSourceForm.zkServicesPathRequired: Please input the root path of service registration.
serviceSourceForm.zkServicesPathPlaceholder: /dubbo and /services are listened by default. The former is the default root path of dubbo service, and the latter is the default root path of Spring Cloud services.
serviceSourceForm.nacosNamespaceIdPlaceholder: Only following inputs are allowed: upper- and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
serviceSourceForm.nacosNamespaceIdRequired: Please input the ID of the Nacos namespace.
serviceSourceForm.consulNamespaceTooltip: Namespace info is required for Concul service sources.

route.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{currentRouteName}}</1>?

routeForm.routeNameTip: Using a name related to the business scenario is recommended. e.g.: user-default, user-gray, etc.
routeForm.routeNameRequired: Only following characters are allowed: lower-case letters, numbers and special characters (- .). And the name can not begin or end with a special character.
routeForm.routeNamePlaceholder: Only following characters are allowed: lower-case letters, numbers and special characters (- .). And the name can not begin or end with a special character.
routeForm.matchTypeTooltip: The relation among different arguments is "and", which means the more rules are configured, the smaller the range to match is
routeForm.pathPredicatesRequired: Please select a path matching predicate.
routeForm.pathMatcherRequired: Please input the path match target.
routeForm.methodMatcherPlaceholder: HTTP method to match. Multiple selections are allowed. If left blank, it will match all the HTTP methods.
routeForm.headerTooltip: The relation among different arguments is "and".
routeForm.queryTooltip: The relation among different arguments is "and".

tlsCertificate.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{currentTlsCertificateName}}</1>?

tlsCertificateForm.name: Certificate Name
tlsCertificateForm.nameTooltip: Globally unique. The backend is directly associated with the Secret name under the Higress namespace in K8s.
tlsCertificateForm.nameRequired: Only following inputs are allowed: upper-and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.
tlsCertificateForm.namePlaceholder: Only following inputs are allowed: upper-and lower-case letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-) and asterisk (*). No longer than 256 characters.

error.409_put: Resource is already updated by someone else. Please refresh and try again.
